TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DependencyObjectType extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Implements an underlying type cache for all derived types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> represents a specific underlying system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>. <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> is essentially a wrapper for the ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) <xref:System.Type> so that it can extend some of its capabilities.
This class has no public constructor. Instances of this class can only be obtained through properties on other objects (such as <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>), or through the static method <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.FromSystemType%2A>.

Docs.summary: Gets the of the immediate base class of the current .
Docs.value: The type of the base class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DependencyObjectType FromSystemType(class System.Type systemType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a that represents a given system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) type.
Docs.returns: A that represents the system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> maintains a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A> property that returns a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>, but this requires having a particular <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> instance. You can use this static utility method if you do not yet have a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> instance and require a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>.
## Examples The following example calls <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.FromSystemType%2A> , creating a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> based on the type of the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class.
[!code-csharp[PropertiesOvwSupport#DOTFromSystemType](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertiesOvwSupport/CSharp/page3.xaml.cs#dotfromsystemtype)] [!code-vb[PropertiesOvwSupport#DOTFromSystemType](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertiesOvwSupport/visualbasic/page3.xaml.vb#dotfromsystemtype)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation is linked to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.Id%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets a zero-based unique identifier for constant-time array lookup operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Do not use for general hashing functions. There is no guarantee on this value. It can vary between application runs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsInstanceOfType(class System.Windows.DependencyObject dependencyObject) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to compare with the current .
Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified object is an instance of the current .
Docs.returns: if the class represented by the current is in the inheritance hierarchy of the passed as ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objects of the exact same type return `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsSubclassOf(class System.Windows.DependencyObjectType dependencyObjectType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the current derives from the specified .
Docs.returns: if the parameter and the current represent types of classes, and the class represented by the current derives from the class represented by . Otherwise, . This method also returns if and the current represent the same class.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the represented [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] system type.
Docs.value: The name of the represented [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] system type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.Name%2A> is the same string as the name of the type name of the <xref:System.Type>.

Docs.summary: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] system type represented by this .
Docs.value: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] system type represented by this .
